TopicTitle: Can you set skin thermal mass separately?

Articles.Content:
...or configure the ratio between internal and skin thermal mass somehow?

I could swear I saw this somewhere. I am completely unable to find it now. Google isn't helping. Neither is forum search. Was I imagining things?

Yes, you can.

skinMassPerArea - defaults to 1 (kg/m^2)

That's what it was! Just slightly thee wrong search term, go figure. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Many thanks!
